projects.projectDescription: CallWisely.ai ensures your business captures every opportunity with AI-powered phone agents that work 24/7, 365 days a year. No more dropped calls, no more lost revenue. The platform provides intelligent call handling, customer service automation, and seamless integration with existing business systems.
features: 24/7 AI-powered phone agents for continuous availability
Natural language processing for human-like conversations
Integration with existing CRM and business systems
Real-time call analytics and performance monitoring
Customizable AI responses based on business needs
Multi-language support for global businesses
Call routing and escalation to human agents when needed
Revenue tracking and opportunity capture metrics
projects.execution: Developed CallWisely AI over 7 months as the lead AI Integration Developer, working with a team of 4 developers and 2 AI specialists. Built using Python with advanced speech recognition APIs and real-time processing capabilities. Implemented a microservices architecture to handle high call volumes and ensure 99.9% uptime. The main challenge was creating natural-sounding AI conversations that could handle complex customer inquiries, which I solved by training custom language models and implementing sophisticated context management systems.

projectResults.description: CallWisely AI revolutionized business communication for clients, ensuring no opportunities are missed and significantly improving customer service efficiency. The platform's 24/7 availability and intelligent call handling led to substantial revenue increases and customer satisfaction improvements.
metrics: 99.9% call availability achieved across all client businesses
300% increase in after-hours lead capture for clients
85% customer satisfaction rate with AI interactions
50,000+ calls successfully handled monthly
40% reduction in missed business opportunities
Average 25% increase in client revenue from captured calls

projects.projectDescription: Bree AI helps users craft the perfect application and land the interview. The platform instantly enhances CVs, generates tailored cover letters, and provides master-level interview preparation with AI-powered voice and text coaching, giving job seekers a competitive edge in today's market.
features: AI-powered CV enhancement and optimization
Tailored cover letter generation for specific jobs
Voice coaching with real-time feedback and analysis
Text-based interview preparation and practice
Industry-specific application customization
ATS (Applicant Tracking System) optimization
Performance tracking and improvement suggestions
Mock interview scenarios with AI feedback
projects.execution: Built Bree AI over 6 months as the primary AI Developer and Frontend Engineer, collaborating with a team of 3 developers and 1 UX designer. Used React for the frontend with Python and OpenAI API for AI capabilities. Implemented speech recognition and analysis for voice coaching features. The biggest challenge was creating accurate voice coaching algorithms that could provide meaningful feedback on interview performance, which I solved by developing custom speech analysis models combined with sentiment analysis and content evaluation systems.

projectResults.description: Bree AI successfully empowered job seekers to significantly improve their application materials and interview performance. The platform's AI-driven approach led to measurably better job search outcomes and increased user confidence in the application process.
metrics: 5,000+ CVs enhanced and optimized through the platform
15,000+ tailored cover letters generated for users
78% of users reported improved interview confidence
65% increase in interview callback rates for platform users
10,000+ voice coaching sessions completed
Average 40% improvement in mock interview scores

projects.projectDescription: Nexuscale AI is an advanced email marketing platform that leverages artificial intelligence to automate sales processes and deliver exceptional results. The platform writes result-driven emails, targets customers effectively, reveals competitor secrets, and schedules meetings, helping businesses achieve significant growth while saving valuable time.
features: AI-powered email content generation using GPT models
Smart customer targeting and segmentation algorithms
Competitor analysis and market insights
Automated meeting scheduling integration
Real-time campaign performance analytics
Smart follow-up automation sequences
Community platform for strategy sharing and networking
Integration with major CRM and email platforms
projects.execution: Served as AI Integration Developer and Backend Architect over 8 months, working with a team of 3 developers and 1 AI specialist. Built the platform using Python with OpenAI API integration and React frontend. Used ML-driven development methodology with continuous model training and optimization. The primary challenge was integrating multiple AI models while maintaining real-time performance, which we solved by implementing a microservices architecture with Redis caching and efficient queue management.

projectResults.description: Nexuscale AI delivered exceptional results for businesses, revolutionizing their email marketing approach and significantly boosting sales performance. The platform's AI-driven features provided measurable business growth and substantial time savings for users.
metrics: 250% average revenue increase for client businesses
8.7x improvement in email conversion rates
37 hours saved per week per user through automation
400% increase in deals closed by platform users
92% monthly user retention rate indicating high satisfaction
10,000+ AI-generated emails created daily across the platform

projects.projectDescription: Sema is a comprehensive platform connecting therapists and clients with integrated communication tools for mental health support. The system provides a secure environment for therapeutic sessions through real-time messaging and high-quality video conferencing capabilities.
features: Real-time chat system for secure therapist-client communication
HD video calling functionality for remote therapy sessions
User authentication and role-based access control
Appointment scheduling and management system
Secure payment processing integration
Therapist profile and availability management
Session notes and client progress tracking
Mobile-responsive design for accessibility
projects.execution: Led the development of Sema's platform over 6 months as a solo developer using Elixir and Phoenix LiveView. Implemented secure video calling with WebRTC and end-to-end encryption to ensure HIPAA compliance. Used agile methodology with weekly client sprints to iteratively build features. The main challenge was creating a reliable, secure video communication system for healthcare, which I solved by implementing robust WebRTC protocols with fallback mechanisms and comprehensive security measures.

projectResults.description: Sema successfully launched and gained rapid user adoption, becoming a vital platform for mental health support during the pandemic. The platform's reliability and ease of use led to strong user engagement and positive feedback from both therapists and clients.
metrics: 1,000+ active users within 3 months of launch
5,000+ therapy sessions successfully facilitated
99.9% system uptime achieved throughout operation
98% therapist satisfaction rate based on surveys
Sub-200ms average chat response time
Enabled 24/7 mental health support during COVID-19 crisis

projects.projectDescription: Mwamba RFC System is a comprehensive website that allows rugby fans to buy tickets to games, purchase official merchandise, and pay for club memberships. The platform includes a robust content management system that enables administrators to manage all website content, ensuring fresh and engaging fan experiences.
features: Online ticket purchasing system for rugby matches
Full e-commerce store for official merchandise
Membership registration and payment processing
Content management system for dynamic content updates
Fan engagement features and news sections
Event calendar and fixture management
Secure payment processing with multiple payment options
Mobile-responsive design for fan accessibility
projects.execution: Developed the Mwamba RFC system over 4 months as a solo full-stack developer using Ruby on Rails and React. Implemented a comprehensive e-commerce solution with Stripe payment integration and built a custom CMS for easy content management. The main challenge was creating a seamless ticketing system that could handle high-demand match tickets while preventing overselling, which I solved by implementing real-time inventory management with secure seat allocation and queue management systems.

projectResults.description: The Mwamba RFC website successfully digitized the club's operations, providing fans with easy access to tickets, merchandise, and membership services. The platform significantly improved fan engagement and created new revenue streams for the rugby club.
metrics: 2,500+ match tickets sold through the platform
500+ merchandise items sold in the first 6 months
300+ new memberships processed online
95% customer satisfaction rate for online purchases
60% increase in fan engagement through digital platform
40% reduction in administrative workload for club staff

projects.projectDescription: Official campaign platform supporting Raila Odinga's bid to become the Chairperson of the African Union Commission (AUC). The website serves as a central hub for disseminating campaign information, engaging with supporters, and showcasing Odinga's vision and policies for the African Union across all 54 African countries.
features: Multi-language support for pan-African reach
Interactive policy showcase and vision presentation
Supporter engagement and newsletter system
Media center with press releases and updates
Social media integration and sharing tools
Mobile-responsive design for accessibility
SEO optimization for maximum reach
Real-time content updates and news feeds
projects.execution: Developed the campaign website in 3 months working with a small team of 2 developers. Built with React and Next.js for optimal performance and SEO. Used rapid deployment methodology with daily updates during the active campaign period. The main challenge was supporting multiple African languages and handling high traffic loads during peak campaign moments, which we solved by implementing efficient CDN distribution and caching strategies.

projectResults.description: The campaign website achieved exceptional reach across the African continent, serving as the primary digital hub for Raila Odinga's AUC campaign. The platform successfully engaged supporters and disseminated campaign information to a pan-African audience.
metrics: 500,000+ unique visitors during the campaign period
Accessed from all 54 African countries
Average 4-minute session duration showing high engagement
50,000+ social media shares and viral content
95+ Google PageSpeed score for optimal performance
Served as central digital platform for continental campaign

projects.projectDescription: PickleSchedule AI is a revolutionary pickleball scheduling platform that eliminates the complexity of traditional sports apps. Players simply text their availability and preferences, and the AI handles all coordination, matching, and scheduling automatically. No stress, no apps - just text and play.
features: SMS-based scheduling interface for easy access
AI-powered player matching based on skill and availability
Automatic court availability checking and booking
Weather integration for outdoor game planning
Player skill level assessment and matching
Automated reminder and notification system
Game history and statistics tracking
Community building and player networking
projects.execution: Developed PickleSchedule AI as a solo developer over 4 months using Elixir and Phoenix with Twilio and OpenAI API integrations. Employed user-centered design methodology with continuous player feedback to refine the SMS interface. The main challenge was implementing natural language processing for SMS commands in a sports context, which I solved by training custom AI models specifically for sports-related language understanding and scheduling terminology.

projectResults.description: PickleSchedule AI successfully simplified pickleball coordination, creating a thriving community of players who appreciate the effortless scheduling system. The platform's AI-driven approach eliminated traditional app complexity and significantly improved game organization efficiency.
metrics: 2,000+ games successfully scheduled and coordinated
500+ active players registered and engaged
98% user satisfaction score based on feedback surveys
80% reduction in time spent on game coordination
5 new pickleball communities formed through the platform
Average 3 games scheduled per user per week showing high engagement

projects.projectDescription: A comprehensive meal planning system that helps users organize their weekly meals efficiently. The application allows users to plan meals for the week, manage their recipe collection, and automatically generate smart shopping lists based on their meal plans, making healthy eating more accessible and organized.
features: Interactive weekly meal planning calendar
Comprehensive recipe management and storage
Automatic shopping list generation from meal plans
Ingredient inventory tracking and management
Nutritional information display and analysis
Meal preparation time estimation
Dietary restriction and preference filtering
Family meal planning with portion scaling
projects.execution: Built the meal planning system over 5 months working with a team of 2 developers using React and Ruby on Rails. Applied feature-driven development methodology with regular user testing sessions to ensure usability. The primary technical challenge was developing complex recipe-to-shopping-list algorithms that could intelligently consolidate ingredients and handle measurement conversions, which I solved by creating a smart ingredient consolidation system with automated measurement conversion capabilities.

projectResults.description: The meal planning system successfully helped users organize their eating habits and reduce food waste while saving significant time on meal preparation. The platform's smart features led to improved user health outcomes and cost savings.
metrics: 10,000+ meals successfully planned by platform users
5,000+ recipes stored and shared in the community database
Average 2 hours saved per week per user on meal planning
85% weekly active user rate showing strong engagement
40% improvement in meal consistency reported by users
25% average reduction in food waste and grocery costs
